name: Biathlon Battle VR
description: Biathlon Battle VR is a sports simulator game combining a ski race with rifle shooting. Rush on skis among snow-covered woods and mountains, participating in races and taking away gold medals.
minimum_requirements: İşletim Sistemi: Windows 7 İşlemci: Intel i3 or similar Bellek: 8 GB RAM Ekran Kartı: GTX 1060 or equivalent Depolama: 3500 MB kullanılabilir alan İlave Notlar: HTC
recommended_requirements: Önerilen: İşletim Sistemi: Windows 10 İşlemci: Intel i5 Bellek: 16 GB RAM Ekran Kartı: GTX 1080 or similar Depolama: 3500 MB kullanılabilir alan İlave Notlar: HTC
